channel.title: How you make admin on a 525
channel.description: how do i make myself an admin on a 525? can some1 help me?

item.title: How you make admin on a 525
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Open: “Data” then open “savedgames” then open “YOUR CHARACTER NAME” make sure you right click and click “Open with…” and open it with “Notepad” Once you are in the file press Ctrl+f and write “rights” and search for it, it should say: 0 change it to 2 for administrator or 1 for moderator; for owner it’s still 2.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How you make admin on a 525
